p: Revision: Thanks for the suggestion, the data reads of Illumina sequencing have been deposited in the National Center for Biotechnology Information Sequence Read Archive (SRA accession: PRJNA598542; Temporary Submission ID: SUB6764411; SAMPLE: Curcuma wenyujin (SAMN13707351); Release date: 2020-01-08. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/PRJNA598542).
